verses.verse: A Prayer of David. Hear <S%H8085><s%> the right <S%H6664><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, attend <S%H7181><s%> unto my cry <S%H7440><s%>; Give ear <S%H238><s%> unto my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, that goeth not <S%H3808><s%> out of feigned <S%H4820><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Let my sentence <S%H4941><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> from thy presence <S%H6440><s%>; Let thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> look <S%H2372><s%> upon equity <S%H4339><s%>.

Thou hast proved <S%H974><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%>; Thou hast visited <S%H6485><s%> me in the night <S%H3915><s%>; Thou hast tried <S%H6884><s%> me <S%H4672><s%>, and findest nothing <S%H2161><s%>; I am purposed that my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall not transgress <S%H5674><s%>.
As for the works <S%H6468><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, by the word <S%H1697><s%> of thy lips <S%H8193><s%> I have kept <S%H8104><s%> me from the ways <S%H734><s%> of the violent <S%H6530><s%>.
My steps <S%H838><s%> have held fast <S%H8551><s%> to thy paths <S%H4570><s%>, My feet <S%H6471><s%> have not slipped <S%H4131><s%>.
I have called <S%H7121><s%> upon thee <S%H6030><s%>, for thou wilt answer me <S%H410><s%>, O God: Incline <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto me <S%H8085><s%>, and hear my speech <S%H565><s%>.

Show thy marvellous <S%H6395><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, O thou that savest <S%H3467><s%> by thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> them that take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in thee From those that rise up against them <S%H6965><s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me as the apple <S%H380><s%> of the eye <S%H1323><s%>; Hide <S%H5641><s%> me under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of thy wings <S%H3671><s%>,
From <S%H6440><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> oppress <S%H7703><s%> me <S%H5315><s%>, My deadly enemies <S%H341><s%>, that compass me about <S%H5362><s%>.
They are inclosed <S%H5462><s%> in their own fat <S%H2459><s%>: With their mouth <S%H6310><s%> they speak <S%H1696><s%> proudly <S%H1348><s%>.
They have now compassed <S%H5437><s%> us in our steps <S%H838><s%>; They set <S%H7896><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> to cast us down <S%H5186><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>.
He is like <S%H1825><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> that is greedy <S%H3700><s%> of his prey <S%H2963><s%>, And as it were a young lion <S%H3715><s%> lurking <S%H3427><s%> in secret places <S%H4565><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Confront <S%H6923><s%> him <S%H6440><s%>, cast him down <S%H3766><s%>: Deliver <S%H6403><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the wicked <S%H7563><s%> by thy sword <S%H2719><s%>;

From men <S%H4962><s%> by thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, From men <S%H4962><s%> of the world <S%H2465><s%>, whose portion <S%H2506><s%> is in this life <S%H2416><s%>, And whose belly <S%H990><s%> thou fillest <S%H4390><s%> with thy treasure <S%H6840><s%>: They are satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with children <S%H1121><s%>, And leave <S%H3240><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of their substance to their babes <S%H5768><s%>.
As for me <S%H2372><s%>, I shall behold thy face <S%H6440><s%> in righteousness <S%H6664><s%>; I shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>, when I awake <S%H6974><s%>, with beholding thy form <S%H8544><s%>.
